#include<iostream>
#include<map>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    map<string, int> l;
    string name;  
    int N, m, x;
    cin >> N;
    m = 0;
    while(N--)
    {
	cin >> name;
	if(l.count(name))
	    l[name] += 1;
	else
	    l[name] = 1;

	x = l[name];
	
	if(x > m)
	{
	    m = x;
	    cout << m  <<" "<< name << endl;
	}
    }
return 0;
}
